original_text: and they shall deal with you in hatred and take away all the fruit of your labor and leave you naked and bare, and the nakedness of your whoring shall be uncovered. Your lewdness and your whoring
korean_text: 그들이 미워하는 마음으로 네게 행하여 네 모든 수고한 것을 빼앗고 너를 벌거벗은 몸으로 두어서 네 음행의 벗은 몸 곧 네 음란하며 행음하던 것을 드러낼 것이라

sentences.original_text: and they shall deal with you in hatred
and take away all the fruit of your labor
sentences.korean_translation: 네 수고의 모든 열매를 빼앗아 갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: and leave you naked and bare
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 벌거벗은 채로 버려 둘 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the nakedness of your whoring shall be uncovered
